## **5.1 Data loading and cleanup** 
Explain the data loading and cleanup

**Data loading**
How the data is loaded

```{r}
df <- read.csv("Data/ProjectTycho_Level2_v1.1.0_0/ProjectTycho_Level2_v1.1.0.csv", header=TRUE, sep = ',')
```

**Data cleanup** 

How the data is cleaned
```{r}
#Convert date columns to date
df$from_date <- ymd(df$from_date)

```


## **Playground (DELETE LATER)**
```{r}
unique(df$country)

```
```{r}
TX_DF = df[df$state == "TX" & df$loc_type == "STATE"  & df$event == "CASES", ]

```
```{r}
unique(TX_DF$event)
```
```{r}
results = aggregate(TX_DF$number, by=list(Category=TX_DF$from_date), FUN=sum)
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = results) +
geom_point(mapping = aes(x = Category, y = x))
```
